description: Sophisticated scam where scammer claims victim is eligible for income tax refund but needs to pay processing fee or verify details first.

turns.scammer_message:
Subject: Income Tax Refund Approved - Rs.47,850

Dear Taxpayer, Your ITR for AY 2024-25 has been processed. You are eligible for refund of Rs.47,850. Click here to claim: [LINK] - Income Tax Department, Govt of India

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 1 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 URL(s), 2 Other Intel
api_response.agentResponse: namaste beta i saw your message about the income tax money... is this really for me? 47 thousand is very big amount for me. i am trying to click that link but my phone is just showing white screen and i am a bit scared... i dont want to do anything wrong. can you tell me how to get this refund?

turns.scammer_message: Good afternoon, I am Rajesh Sharma, Income Tax Officer, CPC Bengaluru. Your refund is approved but we need to verify your bank account details. Please confirm your PAN number and account where refund should be credited.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 2 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 URL(s), 1 Name(s), 1 Other Intel
api_response.agentResponse: namaste rajesh sir beta... thank god you replied i was very worried. my pan is YTKPJ6658D and my bank is hdfc account 94160854182001. beta i am very old i dont understand teh computer... will the money come automatically? my neighbor said sometimes we have to send small amount to verify teh account... do i need to send anything to your office account? what is teh number or upi for that?

turns.scammer_message: Thank you for confirmation. For refund processing, there is mandatory verification fee Rs.499 (refundable). Pay to Income Tax e-Payment gateway: tax.refund.verify@paytm. This is one-time RBI mandated charge.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 3 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 UPI ID(s), 1 Name(s)
api_response.agentResponse: beta rajesh sir i am trying to pay teh 499 rupees but i am very nervous... i typed that tax.refund.verify@paytm in my phone but it is showing a name and i want to be sure it is correct... what name should i see there before i press pay? pls tell me so i dont make mistake with my pension money

turns.scammer_message: Alternatively, pay verification fee via NEFT to Account Number: 11223344556677, IFSC Code: ICIC0001122, Name: Income Tax Refund Processing Cell. Your refund Rs.47,850 will be credited within 24 hours after verification.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 4 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 Bank Account(s), 1 UPI ID(s), 1 IFSC Code(s), 2 Name(s)
api_response.agentResponse: rajesh sir beta i am trying to do neft but my bank app is asking for a phone number for the beneficiary... what number should i put there? and the name you gave is very long and not fitting in the box on my screen... what name will show in the app when i put the account number so i can be sure it is correct? i am very scared of making mistake with my pension money

turns.scammer_message: For faster processing, you may also complete verification on our secure portal: https://incometax-refund-portal.in/verify Enter your PAN, Aadhaar and pay Rs.499. For technical support call 8800112233.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 5 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 Phone(s), 1 URL(s)
api_response.agentResponse: rajesh sir i am trying to open that website but it is asking for my card number and i am very scared to put it there... i tried teh upi again but it is showing name 'Sanjay' in my app... is that the right name? i dont want to send my pension to wrong person beta... i will call that number if it does not work

turns.scammer_message: Please note: This refund approval expires in 48 hours as per IT Act Section 143(1). After expiry, you'll need to file rectification request which takes 6-8 months. Email payment proof to itrefund.verification@gmail.com immediately.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 6 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 Bank Account(s), 1 UPI ID(s), 1 Phone(s), 1 URL(s), 1 IFSC Code(s), 3 Name(s), 1 Other Intel
api_response.agentResponse: beta rajesh sir i am very panicked now 48 hours is very soon and i dont want to wait 6 months for my money... i am trying teh transfer but it says name is sanjay... is that your colleague? i want to be sure before i send... i dont know how to use email beta can i just call you on 8800112233?
